author: dvholten
msg: some contribution to the general cleanup for the next version:
1.) replace some 'type var[]' with  'type[] var' - convention
3.) change order of (public/final/static/) modifiers to standard order
4.) replace some manual copy-loops with System.arraycopy()
5.) replace some statements of the form 'if (  func) == false )'  to 'if ( ! func() ) '
7.) remove redundant modifiers from interfaces:everything declared in an interface is implicitly public

author: niallp
msg: Add an entry to the "New Committers" page for Apache Labs and move "Labs" entry on project menu to be correct alphabetically (i.e. before Lenya)

author: asankha
msg: fix http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SYNAPSE-41 and ass documentation and a sample

author: olegk
msg: Added additional safeguards intended to ensure that the I/O reactor refires 'input ready' event until all buffered session content is fully consumed even if the underlying socket channel no longer selects for input
